currentIssues.description: Completely black screen with no visible content, lyrics, or controls
No visible UI elements for screen readers or keyboard navigation
No visible text, lyrics, or chord information displayed
No visible transport controls, scrolling buttons, or interactive elements

recommendations.title: Implement keyboard shortcuts overlay
recommendations.description: Add keyboard shortcut hints (Space=play/pause, ↑↓=speed, ←→=position) with visual indicators
recommendations.code: className='absolute top-4 right-4 bg-white/10 backdrop-blur rounded-lg p-3 text-white/80'

recommendations.title: Implement high-contrast lyrics display
recommendations.description: Create a centered lyrics area with large, high-contrast white text on dark background for stage visibility. Add subtle section dividers.
recommendations.code: className='bg-gray-900 text-white text-4xl lg:text-6xl font-medium leading-relaxed text-center px-8 py-12'

recommendations.title: Create chord display system
recommendations.description: Show chords above lyrics in smaller, muted text with consistent positioning and alignment
recommendations.code: className='text-2xl lg:text-3xl text-blue-400 font-mono mb-2 tracking-wide'

recommendations.title: Add song structure indicators
recommendations.description: Display current section (Verse 1, Chorus, etc.) in top-left with progress bar showing song position
recommendations.code: className='fixed top-4 left-4 text-white/60 text-xl font-semibold uppercase tracking-wider'

recommendations.title: Add floating control panel
recommendations.description: Create a semi-transparent floating control bar at bottom with play/pause, speed controls, and position scrubber
recommendations.code: className='fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-black/70 backdrop-blur-sm p-4 flex items-center gap-4'
